greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors of n which are not greater than the squarefree kernel of n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: The squarefree kernel of 56=7*2^3 is 14=7*2 and the divisors <= 14 of 56 are {1, 2, 4, 7, 8, 14}, therefore a(56)=6.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 19 2002
